text: Narayan (26 September 1940 – 16 August 2022) was an Indian writer. He was best known for his debut novel Kocharethi (1998). He was born in Idukki, British Raj. He won the Kerala Sahitya Akademi Award in 1999. Narayan died on 16 August 2022 in Idukki, India from COVID-19 at the age of 81.പ്രശസ്ത നോവലിസ്റ്റ് നാരായൻ അന്തരിച്ചു ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian novelists Category:Writers from Kerala Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India Category:Malayali people
title: Narayan (writer)
